answers.text:
Hi Kathleen, 
You might want to take a look at the Downtown Facade Grant Program Brochure that discusses both the exterior facade and the landscaping around buildings. icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/13431
Best, 
Robin Saywitz
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

answers.author: Jay Evans
answers.text:
Robin is on the right track.  Many communities have facade grant programs that work similar to what you are wanting.  They are often funded by TIF districts, which anticipates some improvement in the value of a building/area by improving a building's facade.  Landscaping is different because it isn't a permanent improvement.  Check with cities that have a Main Street program.  A good place to start would be the City of Delray Beach Community Redevelopment Agency.

author: Kathleen Margoles
text: I am looking for guidelines for any grant programs for commercial property landscape enhancement.   We have a corridor with older businesses that have little or no landscaping, and in some cases no space for landscaping.  We need innovative approaches.  Thank you
title: Grant programs for commercial property landscape enhancement
